name: Temporal Policy Versioning Schema (TPVS)
description: Defines the required mapping schema for critical governance assets, enabling atomic and temporal switching during GSEP-C activation.

asset_type.description: The governance asset identifier (e.g., PVLM, CFTM, ADTM, MPAM).

active_history.description: Ordered log of state transitions (hashes) and their associated activation windows.

asset_hash_v95.description: The immutable, ACAL-committed hash of the attested asset ($A_{next}$).

activation_timestamp.description: Epoch timestamp of successful S0 activation.

deactivation_timestamp.description: Epoch timestamp when this hash was superseded, or NULL if currently active.

acm_reference.description: Reference identifier for the full ACM in the ACAL.

validated_integrity.description: True if the Post-S0 GVDM check passed upon activation.
